A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I walked out of this movie so angry about what they did to Luke’s character I wanted to cry. They made him look like the biggest wimp there ever was. There was no big comeback\, not even a decent showdown with kylo ren.. it was all like fake.. Poe was obnoxiously careless and Finn and Rose’s little side quest was pointless. It was way too long\, disappointing\, and boring. Just plain upsetting.
